citations.narrative:
A 6 month old Pitbull/Australian Shepard mix has no water or water bowl during inspection at 2:30pm. All other dogs in
the same housing area have water. The enclosures have log sheets that show that they are cleaned by students 3 to 4
times a day. The enclosure was last cleaned at12:00PM. The dog was given a bowl of water at the time of inspection and
did not drink. For their health, growth, and well being, growing dogs have a high demand for water. To ensure the
availability of this vital requirement, potable water must be continuously available to all dogs unless restricted by the
attending veterinarian.
To be corrected by: January 17, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
A 6 month old Pitbull/Australian Shepard mix has no water or water bowl during inspection at 2:30pm. All other dogs in 
the same housing area have water. The enclosures have log sheets that show that they are cleaned by students 3 to 4 
times a day. The enclosure was last cleaned at12:00PM. The dog was given a bowl of water at the time of inspection and 
did not drink. For their health, growth, and well being, growing dogs have a high demand for water. To ensure the 
availability of this vital requirement, potable water must be continuously available to all dogs unless restricted by the 
attending veterinarian.  
To be corrected by: January 17, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
